patthana8.71:1.1: Naniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.71:2.1: Naaniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.71:3.1: Naniyyānikañca naaniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.71:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
